name: 8 Pcs Reusable Glass Straws, 8"x8mm Eco-friendly Drinking Straws for Smoothies, Milkshakes, Tea, Juice, Cocktails - Multi-Color Mixed (8Pcs Straight)
short_description: 100% Safe & Healthy Straws: The Glass Straws are made of food-grade high borosilicate heat-resistant glass. Lead-free, non-toxicc, no metal aftertaste, plastic free, BPA free, healthy and environmentally friendly, keep you away from cancer. Glass straws are reusable, it's a safe and suitable alternative to plastic.

Shatter Resistant: High borosilicate glass Straw has anti-crushing function after strengthened, making it both safe and durable to drink from. The edges of our straws are smoothly handmade, no need to worry about hurting your mouth. The straws are suitable for smoothies, beverages, coffee, lemonades, shakes, milk tea, cocktails, hot chocolate, juices, wine and other liquids

Convenient Cleaning: Our reusable straws can withstand 150℃ high temperature and -21℃ low temperature. The straws can withtand heat so they are safe to place in the dishwasher for a complete sanitation. Two full length cleaning brushes are included just in case of clogging.

Multiple Color Straws: This set includes 8pcs multi-color mixing straws. (transparent, yellow, blue, cyan, green, amber, pink, grey) Beautiful color straws set will embellish your kitchen and party.Will perfect for variety beverage.

Service Guarantee: Due to un-control shipping, the straws may damage in transit, if the item damaged, please contact us firstly immediately before leave feedback, we will provide the best solution to you.
product_description: Brighten up your home with these great reusable straws. Even unused, they look like a magnet. Great gift idea for acquaintances, friends and family on all joyful events. Gift for birthdays, weddings or for the next party. Everyone will be happy about the glass drinking straws and put a smile on everyone's face Your own colour for everyone in the family. The edges are nicely rounded for a pleasant feeling when drinking. So every drink becomes an unforgettable experience. The straws are characterised by their high quality and are easy to clean with the brushes. Of course, they are also suitable for the dishwasher. Dishwasher safe Borosilicate glass is a glass that is very temperature resistant, for this reason it is ideal for both warm and cold drinks. Glass is tasteless, unlike plastic, paper, bamboo or stainless steel, whether smoothie, milk shake, juice, cocktail or lemonade, with these straws, every sip is a taste experience. Shatterproof, almost unbreakable characterise these handmade borosilicate straws and convince with their very long durability. Specifications: Color: Transparent, Yellow, Blue, Cyan, Green, Amber, Pink, Grey Material: High Borosilicate Glass Size:200mm*8mm (Glass drinking straw 8mm standard with 5mm inner diameter.) Package include: 8Pcs glass straws + 2pcs cleaning brushes Please Note: These glass drinking straws are very durable but are to be used like any drinking glass with caution.
